title: Our data come from a number of sources. For ®nancial information we use the PACAP dataset, Datastream and IBES. For the ownership structures we use data similar to those in Claessen et al

Speci®cally, the Worldscope database is the starting point of data collection. It provides the names and holdings of the six largest owners of the companies.
